title: Taljichi
author: Taljichi
content: https://ibb.co/sWRvhVdhttps://ibb.co/mq6LM6whttps://ibb.co/wRnnqZghttps://ibb.co/hKWN8MYShowcasing some images of how it works  Wanted to share Indicator that basicly shows when to short and when to long , it is not perfect but it does its job 100% on dumps or pumps , but a bit lackluster in consilidation periods though still making profits but and some losses. Though you get targets to hit indication and recommendation move stop loss to entry after first target.Those who have hard Time learning crypto market I think there is nothing better then having such guiding indicator
